register_termsAndConditionContent:
Privacy Policy for Sociolingo

Effective Date: February 26, 2024

Welcome to Sociolingo. This Privacy Policy is designed to inform you about the collection, use, processing, and disclosure of your personal information in connection with your access to and use of our application.

1. Information We Collect	- Registration Data: When you register to use our app, we collect information including your name, email address, and other details you choose to provide.	- Usage Data: We collect information about your interactions with our app, including the features you use and the time spent on the app.	- Device Information: We may collect specific device information such as IP address, device type, unique device identifiers, browser type, language and regional settings, and geolocation data.

2. How We Use Your Information We use the information collected to:	- Provide, maintain, and improve our app.	- Develop new features and services.	- Personalize the app for you.	- Send communications, including advertisements and promotions.	- Perform analysis and internal operations to understand how you use our app.

3. Sharing Your Information We do not share your personal information with third parties, except in the following cases:	- With your consent.	- With service providers who work on our behalf.	- To comply with the law or to protect the rights, property, or safety of our app, our users, or the public.

4. Your Rights You have the right to access, rectify, or delete your personal data. You may also object to the processing of your data or request the restriction of such processing.

5. Data Deletion If you wish for us to delete your personal information, you may submit a request to [your email address or a link to a data deletion request form].

6. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and if the changes are significant, we will provide a more prominent notice.

7. Contact Us If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at [your email address or phone number].

Terms and Conditions for Sociolingo

1. Acceptance of Terms By accessing or using Sociolingo, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, do not use our services.

2. Use of the Service You agree to use Sociolingo only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of, restrict, or inhibit anyone else's use and enjoyment of the app.

3. Your Account You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your device.

4. Modifications to the Service We reserve the right at any time to modify or discontinue, temporarily or permanently, the service (or any part of it) with or without notice.

5. Termination We may terminate or suspend your access to our app immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms and Conditions.

6. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by the laws of the jurisdiction in which our company is established, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

7. Changes to Terms We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time.

8. Contact Us If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at sociolingo.project@gmail.com.
